body.name: Bear Steamer for Clothes, Handheld Clothes Steamer,1300W Strong Power Garment Steamer with 230ml Tank,Fast Heat-up, Auto-Off, Steam Iron Fabric Wrinkle Remover with Brush for Home and Travel

features: HIGH POWERFUL TO REMOVE WRINKLES QUICKLY: Bear clothes steamer equipped with 1300W strong steamer power, 25s fast heating, It can allows you to effectively remove wrinkles in the shortest possible time！

LARGE CAPACITY FOR LONGER WORKING TIME: With a 230ML big capacity water tank, this garment steamer can provide 10-20 minutes of continuous steam, reducing the annoyance of adding water frequently. A transparent water tank design allows you to keep abreast of the changes in water volume and add water in time.

EMBEDDED LOW-EFFORT BALL DESIGN: This clothes steamer is lightweight in compact size, suitable for both vertical and horizontal steaming, unique embedded energy-saving ball design makes your ironing more smoother and easier.

UNIQUE BUILT-IN AROMATHERAPY BOX: Our steamer is the only steamer on the market with an aromatherapy box, you can add any water-like essential oil you like, the aroma mixed with the strong penetrating steam, it can make the fabrics are always accompanied by aroma.This steamer can be used for a wide range of fabrics,like chiffon/silk/wool/cotton/linen/nylon, etc.
WARRANTY AND TRUST: Refund within 30 days is provided by us. All products enjoy a three-year after sale with 24-hour customer service and lifelong technical support. We always serve you for the best!
body.description: Steamer for Clothes Unique Design and Advanced Features Notes : All garment steamer will be tested for wet water before leaving the factory to ensure normal use. Therefore, there may be water vapor or water droplets residual inside the machine, which will not affect normal use, please don't worry! Power: AC 120V only | 60HZ | 1300W 230 ML water tank for longer working time Dimensions: 4.7x 6.4 x 8.9 (in) Cable Length: 2.7m / 9Ft

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How we got our start? We like simple life, we enjoy innovation things! We believe that the expert-quality home appliances and kitchen appliances will make your home’s life easier and colourful. So here we are. Why we love what we do? We have been recognized by more and more users, this make our work be more significant. We will continue to do this with our users and create more innovative products. Steamer for Clothes Unique Design and Advanced Features Notes : All garment steamer will be tested for wet water before leaving the factory to ensure normal use. Therefore, there may be water vapor or water droplets residual inside the machine, which will not affect normal use, please don't worry! Power: AC 120V only | 60HZ | 1300W 230 ML water tank for longer working time Dimensions: 4.7x 6.4 x 8.9 (in) Cable Length: 2.7m / 9Ft

New Technology Strong 1300W power and new technology can make the steamer heat-up quickly and bring powerful steam output, to smooth frowns in the shortest time. Auto-Off feature can also protect your safety at all times Effortless Design And No-Spilling 2-in-1 vertical and horizontal steamering for different needs, built-in ball help reduce friction for smoother and easily ironironing. It provides a dry steaming no matter the angle you use it. NO LEAKS! Unique Built-in Aromatherapy Box Unique aromatherapy box design: drip into the aromatherapy liquid in it and mix with the steam,make your fabric alway with fragrance * please use water-based essential oils

Enlarged Stainless Steel Panel Enlarged stainless steel panel and 7-holes design, which make steam output more smoother and uniform, also save your ironing time Detachable Brush Good helper for your steamer! use with this detachable brush to remove surface dust when ironing thick fabrics and clothes Brush and clothes steamer have corresponding clasps on the top and bottom : 1. Fasten the upper notch first 2. Press the tail part firmly inward, you can hear a "click" sound Suitable Size And 9Ft Cable Length A 100% safe-to-use garment steamer, gentle with all types of fabrics and garments and upgraded to a longer 9FT cable. Whether you are at home or traveling, it will be an indispensable helper in your life!

Step 1 Remove the water tank in the horizontal direction Step 2 Add water (distilled water is recommended) Step 3 Indicator light on indicates is preheating Step 4 Press the button to start ironing after light off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very capable steamer
reviews.reviewText: The steamer is pretty substantial, so I would not travel with it. It’s very easy to use, it heats up quickly and gets the job done. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Did not rate for travel, since I've just used at home. Works great I just purchased a bunch of curtains for my remodeled home and have mostly used to help to get any remaining creases after the steam dryer and hanging. Works great. Have also used as a quick refresh on some clothes. It is light weight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong and fast.
reviews.reviewText: PROS: This steamer has a fairly large water capacity, heats up fast, has a wide mouth, and is quick to steam out wrinkles.CONS: It's a bit top heavy and clunky. Definitely not for travel. To turn it off, you need to unplug it. There is no off button.NOTES: As soon as you fill the water jug section on the belly (which pulls out easily) and plug in the unit, it begins to heat up. There is no off button and no explanation in the directions that they ship you!!I recommend the unit, but not for travel. Also, if you begin to steam, you may need to shift hands from left to right a few times until the unit is half full because it's a bit heavy when full. If you use weights at the gym, you'll have no issues. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for steam blocking crochet projects
reviews.reviewText: I got this due to the reviews on power and heating capabilities. I work primarily with acrylic yarn and was able to block a queen sized blanket made with acrylic and a shawl made with merino wool. I didn’t need to pre-soak or spray water on the projects prior to steam blocking because the steamer produces just enough. I had to refill the reservoir probably 2 times for the shawl and about 8 times for the blanket. Added bonus is that it gives the option to add essential oil if you want to. I haven’t tested that feature yet but plan to soon. I added a picture of before blocking and then after using the steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There’s no on/off button
reviews.reviewText: This streamer is so convenient & easy to use! You may have to fill it up 2 times or more if you have a lot of clothes to press but it’s worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The rubber plug pops up if you’re using water based essential oils
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It works ok for the steam but frequently the light comes back on and you have to wait for it to turn off (coming back up to temperature) so you can steam again. The compartment on top where you can use water based essential oils to add fragrance to your clothing pops up and you may lose it if you don’t just put it aside or tape it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of steam
reviews.reviewText: My upright steamer broke and I cannot do without one. I decided to give this one a try and was very satisfied with it. It produces a lot of steam and I love that I can steam horizontally or vertically and get the same results. Also love its portability. My other steamer was kept on another level in my house so I was always bringing my clothes to it, now I can bring my steamer to my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use on a business trip. It works just as advertised and now I use it at home almost every day to freshen work shirts. Shirts tend to pickup wrinkles from hanging in the closet. This thing knocks out the wrinkles.
Overall good product. Better than ironing for some fabrics. Good for steaming one outfit at a time not for mass steaming an entire closet otherwise the water has to be refilled quite often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: absolutely so much less fuss than an iron and ironing board, no chance to burn or damage your clothes..wanted one for years..picked the right one
Ich finde das Teil mega. Mir passt prima, von der Kleidung bis Wohnaccessories wird bedampft und geglättet:) Habe gleich noch eins für meine Mutter bestellt:)
Funciona como pretendido, nao faz milagres mas para o que é preciso, serve

Per quanto mi riguarda, questo stiratore verticale è pressochè inutile perchè non è riuscito a spianare -neppure minimamente - delle pieghe su un colletto di cotone. Inoltre per persone di una certa età non è così leggero nè, di conseguenza, maneggevole. Dulcis in fundo: dopo l'uso (anche breve) ci mette un po' a raffreddarsi del tutto, quindi nel riporlo occorre fare attenzione a non scottarsi .
